item.title: Generate a documentation for an ASP.NET Core Web API using Swagger
item.description: Hi everyone! I hope you're having a great sunday. Me and my collegue decided this week to rewrite an api made with Laravel Lumen using ASP.NET Core. While doing so, I was wondering wheter some kind of tool existed to help generate the documentation of the API (since we all know writing a documentation is the least fun thing in programming) and I came across Swagger.
